## MapViewImageCache.loadImage() method

Load an \[\[ImageItem\]\]. Returns a promise or a loaded \[\[ImageItem\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
loadImage(imageItem: ImageItem): ImageItem | Promise<ImageItem | undefined>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  imageItem | [ImageItem](./harp-mapview.imageitem.md) | ImageItem to load. |

[ImageItem](./harp-mapview.imageitem.md) \| Promise&lt;[ImageItem](./harp-mapview.imageitem.md) \| undefined&gt;
